title: This marching girl thing
creator_contributor_role: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Interpersonal conflict
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Gay and lesbian studies
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Interpersonal conflict
description: Cindy (Toni Collette), a baton twirler with the Southern Twirlettes is competing in the Victorian Baton Twirlers competition, her girlfriend Alison (Jenny Apostolou), and boyfriend Peter (Matt Day) in tow. As the results are announced, she questions whether she should continue pursuing "this marching girl thing", and whether she should continue with Alison or Peter.
